notFoundMsg: The page you are trying to reach couldn't be found on the server.
internalErrorMsg: The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
rateErrorMsg: Too many requests, please retry in several minutes.
forbiddenErrorMsg: You don't have permission to access the requested resource.
mFormErr.general: Form contains errors, please check all inputs
mFormErr.server: Form data could not be saved, loaded or processed
mFormErr.uploadError: Could not upload file(s) to the server
mTable.deleteDesc: The following item(s) will be deleted
mTableErr.general: Could not load data from server, please try to reload
mTableErr.delete: Could not delete one or more items
deleteModalText: The following item(s) will be deleted
lockedMessage: The requested item is currently being edited by another user. If you continue editing, saving may end with an error. Please contact the user who is currently editing the item to synchronize your collaboration.
accessDeniedDesc: You don't have permission to access the requested module. Please ask your web site administrator to set the appropriate permissions for your user account.
maintenanceMessage: Site is currently in the maintenance mode, please come back later.
